description:
VR Real Bike Racing 3d is a super bike championship with extreme bike racing challenge. This vr bike racing challenge gives you death racing adrenaline thrill of virtual racing simulator. It's usually difficult to find high quality graphics and faced paced real bike racing games in VR, but sometimes you do find exceptions to this rule like VR Real Bike Racing. This vr bike racing game doesn't offer the official championship bikes or pilots like sbk or moto gp, but at least you can play it absolutely for free.
VR real bike racing puts you on a motorbike racing with most realistic racing simulation around the word in virtual reality. It is a milestone in the genre of moto racing game where you experience to drive real deadly racing on crazy asphalt racing tracks. It is a moto racer superbike realistic racing game along with world racing championship like best tracks. You are going to have moto gp racing game in mobile in a super fast bike racing track where you will have to be ready to steer your bike as a crazy racer.

VR Real Bike Racing is best racing game because of unique HD graphics. There are two racing challenges, Moto Racing Championship mode and Knockout bike racing mode. Racing mode give a competition with other bike challengers and give ranking to your racing based on positions. While knockout bike racing mode gives you ultimate thrilling bike racing where you have multiple races in a row and you have to be avoid elimination by clearing each race without being last racer in game. It is challenging knockout racing mode.

Burn up the track in the most exciting physics based stunt bike racing with the fastest and thrilling adventurous tracks. Move along rivals of your race in a reckless racing track. Your bike have to be a speed machine with accelerated accelerometer in a very hot pursuit of rival racers. An experience neither like cops and bounty hunters nor mud or dirt racing. You will going to have a thrilling rush racing game in the world.

In VR Real Bike Racing each level has to complete all laps without crashing your bike. This game is all about adventure. Avoid accidents with other racers and Get ready to astonishing physics, eye-popping tracks, and awesome bikes through perilous racing tracks! This is the game you have been waiting for!

Key Features:

• Select fast racing bike of your own choice
• Change color of bikes
• Ability to choose number of Laps
• Number of opponents
• Enjoy thrilling racing championship
• Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
• Breathtaking visuals
• Smooth and realistic bike handling
• Different exciting racing tracks
• Easy to learn and drive
• Realistic sound effects and best suited music tracks for locations and races.

How to Play:

• Insert device into Vr Headset
• Tilt right to turn right and tilt left to turn left
• Experience the thrills of real racing and drifting.
